survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate community participation and satisfaction with the local recycling program, identifying areas for improvement and barriers to participation.

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in the community recycling program?
answer_options: Always - I recycle every time possible
Frequently - I recycle often but not always
Never - I do not participate in the recycling program
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to measure frequency of participation. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in the community recycling program?
answer_options: Always - I recycle every time possible
Frequently - I recycle often but not always
Never - I do not participate in the recycling program

questions.question_text: What types of materials do you typically recycle? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify commonly recycled materials. Include an option for non-participation.

script.question_text: What types of materials do you typically recycle? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What are the main reasons you do not participate in the recycling program? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Lack of convenient recycling facilities nearby
Prefer other disposal methods (e.g., trash, donation)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question with an open-ended 'Other' option to capture barriers.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with optional open-text (MULTI_CHOICE with 'Other' input)

script.question_text: What are the main reasons you do not participate in the recycling program? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Lack of convenient recycling facilities nearby
Prefer other disposal methods (e.g., trash, donation)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accessibility of recycling facilities in your area?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction with accessibility.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accessibility of recycling facilities in your area?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the clarity of recycling guidelines provided by the program?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to assess clarity of instructions.

script.question_text: How would you rate the clarity of recycling guidelines provided by the program?

questions.question_text: What improvements would encourage you to recycle more? (Open-ended)
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback on program enhancements.

script.question_text: What improvements would encourage you to recycle more? (Open-ended)

questions.question_text: Do you believe the recycling program positively impacts the environment?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to gauge perceived environmental impact.

script.question_text: Do you believe the recycling program positively impacts the environment?

questions.question_text: Have you encountered any issues with recycling bins (e.g., full, damaged, misplaced)?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to identify logistical problems.

script.question_text: Have you encountered any issues with recycling bins (e.g., full, damaged, misplaced)?

questions.question_text: Would you support expanding the recycling program to include additional materials (e.g., textiles, hazardous waste)?
answer_options: No, the current program is sufficient
No, I would not support expansion
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to assess support for program expansion.

script.question_text: Would you support expanding the recycling program to include additional materials (e.g., textiles, hazardous waste)?
answer_options: No, the current program is sufficient
No, I would not support expansion

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the recycling program to a neighbor or friend?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS) potential.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the recycling program to a neighbor or friend?
